extendedInfo.description: *** Star Chart is now FREE! ***The top Educational & Augmented Reality app - download and find out why more than 6 Million people use Star Chart!.You can now have a virtual planetarium in your pocket! Look through the eyes of your Android device* to see a virtual window into the whole visible universe..All you have to do is point your Android device* at the sky and Star Chart will tell you exactly what you are looking at..Using state of the art GPS technology, an accurate 3D universe, and all of the latest high tech functionality, Star Chart calculates â in real time - the current location of every star and planet visible from Earth and shows you precisely where they are; even in broad daylight!.Want to know what that bright star is called? Point your device at it â you might just find out itâs a planet!.Want to know what the night sky looks like to people on the other side of the earth? Well just point your device down!.Want to know where your star sign is in the sky? Star Chart will tell you all this and more..Star Charts features include:- Just point and view. No need to scroll around the screen to find out what you are looking at*.- Alternatively, look around the sky using finger gestures â perfect for armchair astronomers!- Voice Control: Explore the solar system with commands like: "Fly me to the Moon" / "Go to Saturn" / "Tour Mars" / "Look at Andromeda" / "Where is the Cigar Galaxy?"[English only]- Supports dynamic device orientation viewing. Allows you to view the night sky whilst holding your Android device at any angle.- Accurately depicts all the visible stars of the northern and southern hemispheres - a total of over 120,000 stars!- Displays all the planets of the solar system, plus the sun and the moon. - Displays all 88 constellations, with constellation imagery based on the beautiful artwork by 15th century astronomer Johannes Hevelius.- Includes entire Messier catalogue of exotic deep sky objects.- Tap on anything in the sky and get the facts on what you are looking at, including distance and brightness.- Very powerful zoom function, lets you view the sky in extra detail, using intuitive finger gestures.- Fully configurable. Star Chart displays only the sky objects that you are interested in.- Allows you to view the sky underneath the horizon (unlike other more expensive applications). So now you can see where the sun is, even at night!- Manually set your location to find out what the sky looks like from anywhere in the world.- Full search feature- Installable on an SD card.So point your Android device at the sky and see what's out there!.------------.Escapist Games will update Star Chart regularly, so please send us your feedback and features requests to starchart@escapistgames.com â¦ thanks!.*Augmented Reality mode only available if your device supports it, as this feature requires a built-in compass. Manual scrolling is supported on all other devices..Follow Star Chart on Twitter: StarChartApp - twitter.com/StarChartApp.Star Chart does not require internet access for normal usage. Internet access is only required initially to verify the license and subsequently when accessing the support page and external links.

reviews.title: Double charging?
reviews.comment: So this is how you treat your long time PAYING SUPPORTERS? Double billing them? No thank you. I\'ll be sure to post this to all my Android forums. I\'ll be using Mobile Observatory from now on.
reviews.author: Wayne Hollis

reviews.title: Crashes on ZTE N762
reviews.comment: Crashes right after loading on my android ZTE N762 but for 99 cents I am keeping hoping for a fix 8)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good....!
reviews.comment: I\"m trying to install it but went its finish its says \"package is invalid \".I try second time but its the same.....!
reviews.author: Mark Irvine

reviews.title: Exelent
reviews.comment: This star chart is exelent becuase it can learn kids about star shapes and sizes and directions, and they say that old poeple can sit out side and see the stars moving and its very true yall know
reviews.author: Tayle Stoltz

reviews.title: Work on your PR, guys.
reviews.comment: Still a really good app, though their public relations could use some work. I paid for it a while ago, and don\'t expect that one payment to last forever, but at least make it clear that we aren\'t losing features. It seems that we aren\'t, but I can\'t tell for sure.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Paying twice
reviews.comment: Paid for the app once, now it\'s free and I have to pay for extras. Not happy. At least give existing customers a free upgrade to the new app or something.
reviews.author: Shaz Bogan

reviews.title: whiners
reviews.comment: what do you expect, this us a business for a company to make money first. if you don\'t like it uninstall the app, shut yer hole an have a frwakin coke and a smile. No one forces you to use it whom do you think they are google?
reviews.author: Mark Kamimski

reviews.title: not even real images
reviews.comment: I expect a little more for something to be there to five star one just because the images for I know I\'m not that easy
reviews.author: Cali Aldama

reviews.title: Scam!!
reviews.comment: paid for this apps and now it\'s free and now they release another premium star chart apps which need to pay... i feel deeply scammed.
reviews.author: Wei Keat

reviews.title: Greedy
reviews.comment: I agree with everyone else who paid and commented poorly. I paid for the program, even pointed out a flaw when using it on my Xoom, and now they want me to pay for extras? Greedy is all I can say.
reviews.author: Patrick Barkey

reviews.title: Good but short of...
reviews.comment: Great app. I love it, but it lacks comet tracking. Will there be an update that includes comets? (like ison) please add comets then this app wil be the greatest!
reviews.author: Jacques Pretorius

reviews.comment: After purchase app continues to ask for more money.  Appears to be never-ending money pit.
reviews.author: Ryan Budney

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is virtual animated app but looks intresting
reviews.author: Hamza Masood

reviews.title: I payed for it
reviews.comment: And now it if free and who knows with what kind of surprises as adds or extras?  Not updating!    I was so happy with this app!
reviews.author: Miguel M\303\251zquita

reviews.title: Yay!
reviews.comment: 5 stars for free and amazing app.
reviews.author: Lorenzo Landero

reviews.title: WARNING: Major Scam
reviews.comment: I paid for the premium version of this app, and now it is free and I have to pay again for \"new\" premium features? That is unquestionably the definition of a greedy company looking to scam customers. I will never be purchasing an Escapist Games app again. Who knows what they might try to get away with next.
reviews.author: Matthew Redmond

reviews.title: How to treat paying customers
reviews.comment: I like this app, even with some of the crash issues and being unable to use it without an internet connection (the best stars are far from any city and cell towers) but now I feel pretty cheated after having already paid, and now to be expected to come up with more money?  I bought what I thought was a premium app, apparently not anymore.
reviews.author: Kjirsten Schoenfelder

reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
reviews.comment: [Paid in-app update is in bad taste for a paid app. Now it is free, and we have to buy all the new stuff. I will no longer support this developer].   It was a wonderful app. I just wish the frame rates were better. One big issue is that the stars etc are very off. On my phone they showed to be 20\302\260 off (easterly) from where they really were. This was using the moon as a reference. But, Sky Maps is very accurate, so it\'s not my phone. Loved the app though. That is way I bought it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app for anyone who hasn\'t paid already
reviews.comment: As a previous paying customer, I\'m pretty unhappy about not seeing any sort of recognition for our previous support. Emailed the developer about the whole situation and had every point shot down by apples to oranges comparisons. Sadly I can\'t rate the devs directly, so their choices will have to be reflected in my rating. As for the app itself...The current version is pleasing to look at, AR and night mode are two awesome features of this app. However, orientation of the phone, i.e. looking at the stars, seems to be inaccurate a decent amount of the time for me. I use this app while operating one of the largest telescopes on the east coast and it seems to disagree with the telescope software for quite a few minutes after loading this app. Also not sure I agree with their decisions of making planets look like stars in the \"sky\" and having the Sun, which is a star, under the planets list, as this is an \"education\" app. I\'d give the app 3 stars for its features and interface, but 1 star to the devs ideals and lack of consideration for their supporters.
reviews.author: Alex Koufos

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Paid for it once now they make it free and want me to pay for extras again
reviews.author: Dawid Soroka
